questions.question: Choose the best option for the sentence: 'The sun is shining and there isn't a single cloud. It _____ be raining right now.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'Everything is wet and there are puddles everywhere. It _____ have rained recently.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'The sky is cloudy and it's getting windy. It _____ rain later today.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'They've won so many Champions League titles. That team _____ be Real Madrid.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'That team has never played in a major European final. It _____ be Barcelona.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'They just signed a player for over 100 million euros and play at the Santiago Bernab√©u. That _____ be a mid-table team.'
Choose the best option for the sentence: 'They wear blue, have won the Premier League multiple times, and recently hired a new manager. That _____ be Chelsea.'
